greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: T(n, k) = E(n, k)*2^k where E(n,k) are the Eulerian numbers A173018, for n>0 and 0<=k<=n-1.
comment: Same as A156365, except for the additional a(0) = 1 there.
formula: G.f.: 1/x/Q(0) -1/x, where Q(k) = 1 - x*(k+1)/( 1 - y*2*x*(k+1)/Q(k+1) ); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Dec 17 2013
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, Sep 15 2008
ext: Edited and new name by _Joerg Arndt_, Dec 30 2018
